title: Did Philadelphia Eagles Players Kneel During the National Anthem in 2017?
subtitle: The White House claimed that an event with the Super Bowl champions was cancelled due to a disagreement over kneeling during the pre-game anthem, but no Eagles player knelt in protest during the regular season.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Players on the Philadelphia Eagles knelt in protest during the National Anthem throughout the 2017 regular NFL season.
